projectDetails:
Public Procurement Monitoring Office (PPMO) has the vision to establish a centralized e-Government Procurement (e-GP) System for nation wide public procurement management. This is a web based one stop procurement portal covering various activities of public procurement life cycle including registration of bidders, procurement planning, e-tendering, on-line evaluation, contract management etc.
This system will be used by all Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs) of Government of Nepal. It is hosted at Government Integrated Data Center (GIDC) at Singha Durbar and is accessible by the Public Entities and suppliers through internet.
